meanings.definition: A person who shares equally in an inheritance with one or more others.
meanings.sent1: In the will, each coparcener received an equal share of the property.
meanings.sent2: The coparcener inherited the family estate along with their siblings.
meanings.sent3: At the reading of the will, the coparcener jokingly asked if they could choose the best room.
meanings.sent4: The coparcener stood proudly, knowing they held an equal claim to the ancestral land.
meanings.sent5: The coparcener's portion of the inheritance was like a precious gem, carefully passed down through generations.

meanings.definition: One of two or more joint heirs.
meanings.sent1: As a coparcener, she shared ownership of the property with her cousin.
meanings.sent2: The coparcener and his brother jointly inherited the family business.
meanings.sent3: The coparcener playfully argued with their sibling about who should get the bigger room.
meanings.sent4: Being a coparcener felt like being part of a close-knit team, working together towards a common goal.
meanings.sent5: The coparcener's role as a joint heir was crucial in maintaining the family's legacy.
